channel.title: CVE Feed for FolioVision -- FV Flowplayer Video Player (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FolioVision -- FV Flowplayer Video Player (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-25607|2024-08-03T04:42:50.036Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (author or higher user role) SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability discovered in FV Flowplayer Video Player WordPress plugin (versions <= 7.5.15.727).

item.title: CVE-2022-25613|2024-08-03T04:42:49.936Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in FV Flowplayer Video Player (WordPress plugin) versions <= 7.5.18.727 via &fv_wp_flowplayer_field_splash parameter.
